statements: SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT title, release_date FROM movies WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, title FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM movies ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT id, title, genre FROM movies WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT title, genre FROM movies WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Action' AND release_date < '2019-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM movies ORDER BY genre DESC
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2019-12-31' ORDER BY release_date DESC, title ASC
SELECT title, release_date FROM movies WHERE genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT title, director FROM movies WHERE release_year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan';
SELECT title FROM movies ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT title, director FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2015 AND release_year < 2020;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE director LIKE 'Quentin%';
SELECT title, director FROM movies WHERE release_year > 2000;
SELECT * FROM movies WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan' AND release_year < 2010;
SELECT movie_id, title FROM movies WHERE release_year BETWEEN 1995 AND 2005;
SELECT title, director, release_year FROM movies ORDER BY release_year DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT title, delete_date FROM movies JOIN deleted_movies ON movies.movie_id = deleted_movies.movie_id;
SELECT * FROM Movies ORDER BY title ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT title, release_date FROM Movies WHERE director='John Doe'
SELECT * FROM Movies WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT title, director FROM Movies WHERE director IS NOT NULL
SELECT movie_id, title FROM Movies ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM Movies WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01' AND director = 'Christopher Nolan';
SELECT title, director FROM Movies WHERE movie_id < 10 ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT title, release_date FROM Movies WHERE director LIKE '%Tarantino%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT title, director, release_date FROM Movies WHERE director = 'Martin Scorsese' OR director = 'Quentin Tarantino' AND release_date < '2015-01-01';
SELECT * FROM movie;
SELECT title, genre FROM movie WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT director, title, release_date FROM movie ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM actor WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, rating, review_date FROM movie_review WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY review_date;
SELECT * FROM movie;
SELECT title, genre FROM movie WHERE release_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT director, count(*) as movie_count FROM movie GROUP BY director ORDER BY movie_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM actor JOIN movie_cast ON actor.actor_id = movie_cast.actor_id WHERE role = 'Lead';
SELECT review_text, rating FROM movie_review JOIN movie ON movie_review.movie_id = movie.movie_id WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Movies;
SELECT title, director, rating FROM Movies WHERE rating > 7.5;
SELECT title, director FROM Movies WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Actors ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT Movies.title, Genres.genre_name FROM Movies INNER JOIN MovieGenres ON Movies.movie_id = MovieGenres.movie_id INNER JOIN Genres ON MovieGenres.genre_id = Genres.genre_id;
SELECT title, director, release_date FROM Movies WHERE rating > 8.0 ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT name, birth_date FROM Actors WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY birth_date ASC
SELECT genre_name, COUNT(movie_id) AS movie_count FROM Genres INNER JOIN MovieGenres ON Genres.genre_id = MovieGenres.genre_id GROUP BY genre_name HAVING movie_count > 5
SELECT title, rating FROM Movies INNER JOIN Reviews ON Movies.movie_id = Reviews.movie_id WHERE rating < 6.0 AND review_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY rating ASC
SELECT reviewer_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Reviews GROUP BY reviewer_name HAVING avg_rating > 7.0 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC
